name: Monday Evans
text:
Had an appointment scheduled for July 24, 2020. Arrived at the showroom about 5 minutes early, walked inside with my daughter for my appointment and waited approximately 15 minutes, when a gentleman walked out and asked if we had been helped yet. After telling him we had not, he took us into the warehouse where the slabs were and also where Betty (the sales person supposed to be taking over my appointment) was chatting with a couple of other employees. We could hear them just on the other side of the door when we were waiting for her to come out and greet me for my appointment. They knew we were in the showroom, yet they continued chatting. Betty finally came over where the young man walked us to, showing us the slabs. After being in the store about 20 minutes at this point, they decide to do a temperature scan on us. It was hot in the warehouse and we had masks on. We both scanned 99 temps. They acted as if we had the plague. Betty behaved one the most rude way I’ve ever witnessed, in any environment but especially a sales environment where a customer is hoping to do business with the company they’re patronizing! Betty treated my daughter and I, first of all as if we had the plague and stayed probably 10 feet from us. Even once, when I turned to speak to her, she stepped back about 3 steps like I was about to attack her. Then she treated us as if she was doing us a favor by walking through he warehouse with us. She was not helpful AT ALL, and allowed two other people to take her away from assisting us! I held out as long as I could. It takes a lot to make me mad and I’m always kind to everyone, but she was so disrespectful and rude! I would NEVER hire her to work in my company and I hope the owner/manager reads this review and thinks twice about maintaining her as an employee! Betty has no idea how much I had planned to spend on my countertops, tile work, sinks and faucets! But she will NEVER know now!! Because I’ll find someone who DOES want my business and who respects myself and my daughter. You see, I own a successful business. But Betty has no idea of that. She treated me as if I were a homeless person who walked in off of the street with no money and no plans to purchase anything. Little did she know, I’ll be doing all of my business with OHM!!  And I’ll be sure to let everyone know how I was treated at Triton Stone in Huntsville, Alabama!!
By the way, I see that you guys ONLY respond to positive feedback! That says a lot about your customer service!!

resp.text:
We are so sorry to hear of your negative experience at our Huntsville showroom. This is definitely not the experience we expect to deliver to each customer. As you can imagine, navigating through these COVID times has been somewhat of a challenge. We try to remember that everyone has different situations or circumstances that can make them more cautious than others during this time. Betty is a long-standing employee who historically gets amazing reviews and feedback, and always displays a level of professionalism that holds true to Triton Stone's standards. We are grateful that Betty is able to continue to work for Triton Stone amid COVID. I am truly sorry that you felt disrespected in any way. As far as only responding to positive reviews, that is certainly not our intention. I prefer to speak with customers directly when they have had a negative experience, and more times than not, we are able to reach a solution. Since I personally respond to each situation, perhaps a response online has been overlooked in the past. I am happy to schedule a phone call with you to see if we can make things right. Please email info@tritonstonela.com with your information, and I will reach out.

Kindly,
Rachel Jones
Owner/Vice President

text:
In response to the review left by Monday Evans, I have never seen anything farther from the truth regarding my experience with Betty and the other team members. She and the other lady at the entrance counter (didn’t get her name) were so kind and professional. I have worked for the public most of my adult life and know 1st hand there can be some rude people on both ends but that was absolutely NOT the case. I’ve also come to realize that there are some folks you just cannot please no matter what you do!

name: kyle
text:
If you support truckers (the back bone of America, the ones that bring you food and all the essentials you need) do not shop here. They will boot you and say you owe them 500 bucks to remove it. They say they have signs up to warn truckers to not park or turn around in their lot but the sign is 100 feet off the road and against the building, you can't see that till you are already in the lot. The other 4 signs they have are 1"×2" signs you can't read till you are right on top of them and from what I could see those only said no parking. If you really wanted to till truckers not to use your lot you should put your sign front and center next to the roadway where people can see it.

They clearly can't make enough money on flooring so they have to prey on truck driver to make their mortgage. This place is a cash grab, and a place of extortion.

resp.text: Again sir I have had nothing but problems from disrespectful truckers since I opened my business. If you can’t read a 4 foot by 8 foot sign asking you to not park or turn around there then maybe you are in the wrong line of work. Maybe an optometrist visit is in your future.

text: It's a sad company that preys on unsuspecting truck drivers.

name: Nick Kcin
text: No good, would not recommend. I was sold on the panel flooring we have being pulled up to repair the areas were gaps were located, this wasn't done. All the crew did was squirt glue into the gaps and jam them forward to join them. This resulted in not all the gaps being fixed, and the ones glued a few of them have mounds of dried glue sticking out.  The flooring that was placed was fine, but the 1/4 round wasn't painted/stained on the cut ends, the transitions were nailed in (which is fine) leaving  sharp nail heads sticking up which would easily cut a foot. I guess this job would have been ok if it was cheap but it was not.

name: Diane C
text: I had a terrible experience and would not recommend or use them again. A 1 day installation turned into 5 visits to my home, they have not corrected everything they messed up, and they destroyed all the door frames. They tell you they've have been in business for a long time, but the owners are not the same, and neither is the quality of work.

resp.text: We have been patient in our reply and have decided it is time to respond since you will not take our repeated calls. We understand your frustration with the initial installation of your flooring which resulted in our decision to terminate the original contractor. Obviously we were frustrated as well and we spoke with you at length over the phone about this. The errors he made have been corrected.  You called again with concern that the carpet was not fastened correctly in one area and, though after inspecting we determined there wasn't a problem, we still agreed to have a contractor come and re-stretch it in an effort to resolve your concern.  We disagree that "they destroyed all the door frames".  Yes, there was some slight damage done to some of the door frames but they were far from being "destroyed".  Your salesman offered to repaint those areas himself but you declined.  We have gone as far as discounting your invoice three times in an effort to appease you.  We have a two year labor warranty and we stand behind it.  The quality of work performed by subsequent contractors to correct the errors of the first was excellent.  Hill's Carpet & Floor Coverings has been in business at our main location since 1986.  The original owner sold the business to his nephew some 9 years ago and the original owner remains active in the business.  We are proud of our history of serving the greater Birmingham area by offering quality products, competitive prices, and professional installation.  We're proud of and humbled by so many positive reviews on line.  We recognize that the original installation fell short of the last standard and we have tried diligently to work with you to resolve your remaining issue.

name: Kelly Finnegan
text: We chose to go with Hill’s over a box store like Home Depot or Lowes and we are so glad we did. They were so incredibly helpful throughout the whole process. They let us take home several samples until we found the right one. They explained the different types of carpets and the benefits of each one. Mr Hill personally came out and measured and quoted the room. Installers were right on time and worked quickly and did such a wonderful job. We love our carpet and plan to use Hill’s in the future when we redo our kitchen flooring.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for your honest review! We really do take pride in doing our best to bring beauty to your home without the hassle. Remember us and come back to see us anytime! Thanks again!!

name: Maria Holmes
text:
FYI LONG REVIEW: I originally contacted Hill's back in Aug to refinish our hardwood floors. Very pleasant experience with Clark with setting up my consultation. Cullen came out and did the consultation with me and my husband. It went well, and the price was very reasonable. He advised me that he would email me the proposal and to call him when we were ready.

I waited for the email but never received it. However, I still called a week later and let him know we were ready to schedule but that I still haven't received the proposal email. I didn't feel comfortable calling to pay my deposit over the phone without a proposal. He wasn't at the office when I called but was going to call once he got settled. When he finally called, I wasn't available but I still didn't get a proposal email.

So I waited before calling back. Then Clark called and left a msg asking if my consultation went well and if I was ready to schedule. At that time I was not because I wanted the proposal on paper with the amount I was quoted. Never heard back.

So I called again Monday, 10/12 and spoke with a gentleman about scheduling (yes I was still willing to use this company because the price I was quoted was the best). He got my name and address and tried to look up an invoice or proposal and guess what, there was none!! He asked who did my consultation and I told him Cullen. He said he would get him to call me. Days later, I'm still waiting on my call.

The other 2 companies I've contacted this week have been very responsive and gotten me proposals within the same day of the consultation. I'd rather pay the extra $ for great customer service and communication.

resp.text: Ms. Holmes, your experience with our company is very regrettable.  We strive to establish a meaningful relationship with all our customers resulting in a satisfying experience throughout the purchasing process.  It is unfortunate that in your case we failed to do that and we apologize.  Having been in business in the greater Birmingham area since 1987 we're very humbled and gratified by the excellent rankings we have on social media on Facebook, Google, and the Better Business Bureau.  We appreciate your candidness and again, apologize for not exceeding your expectations.  Your review is a reminder of the importance of delivering a satisfying experience for each and every potential customer every day.

name: frank sebert
text:
Please do yourself and choose wisely before using Hill's, I used the Helena store and can not and would not use or recommend any Hill's seeing how they all the same owner and installers.
I will tell you about my experience, The carpet is nice and seems to be installed well, this is not where the problem is and if you enjoy paying someone to rub paint off your walls and base boards then tell you" well that just happens" then you have found your place. My wife and I spent over an hour sweeping dusting and vacuuming after the installers left angry and in a hurry, when i told them I expected them to vacuum and clean what mess they made during the install, just got in the van and left?!
I will tell you the salesman did at least get me a whole pint of paint so I could repaint what HILL'S CARPET should have taken care of, there wasn't even an offer to say "hey how bout we at least knock of $20.00 or $25.00 for your time and trouble." Granted by what it would have taken to make this right it isn't a major deal, but do you really want to spend your hard earned money and have to clean up and paint a house you just cleaned and painted? Then be disrespected and talked down to in your own home? Please make a better choice than I did. There are many carpet stores in the area and I know most will appreciate your business,
I can tell you for a fact unforunately that HILL'S CARPET will not.

resp.text: We're sorry for the bad service at the time but you may call us at our office anytime. Also thank you for rating honestly. We've recently expanded our showroom in Helena to display a lot more product lines which greatly expands choices and our crews are amazing! Come back and give us another chance to wow you! Thanks!

You will get a high quality job and excellent customer service.

name: Dj Burls
text: I highly recommend Prattville Carpet. They carry quality material which they stand behind and their staff is both friendly and knowledgeable. I purchased their 22mil vinyl flooring which is a commercial grade that you can't view on the floor at the chain stores.

name: Janet Kissane
text: A big THANK YOU to David Cox and his crew of Prattville Carpet!  Great service, great work and I love my new carpet!

name: Tami Gorman
text: Very friendly  great customer service, however my floors have not been installed so I will let you know after that.. I heard they do a wonderful job but I also was told  that they broke a friend of mine's lamp and she had to pay a lot of money to replace it , also they knocked stuff off wall let her to wire back up her tv they should have paid for the lamp !!! but that was her experience not mine...

name: Leah Taylor
text: We had a great experience with Prattville Carpet. David was super friendly and not only helped us pick out exactly what we wanted but was able to help us coordinate a time to get our new flooring in. The staff & David communicated with us throughout the whole process. We absolutely love our new flooring. Thanks David & Prattville Carpet!

name: Jan Sticka
text: The beautiful Mohawk laminate flooring installed by Prattville Carpet. Great customer service from start to finish. Highly recommend them for your flooring needs.

name: Victoria Lowman
text: Great price and very happy with completed floor!!

name: Tina Taylor
text: Terry and team went above and beyond to help me. Terry was able to work around my crazy schedule and  get the job completed, quick, and to perfection. I highly recommend Prattville Carpet. We will definitely be using them again on other projects.

name: Cathee Gipson
text: A master bathroom renovation seemed more than daunting until we reached out to Ray Boles at Prattville Carpet.  His design expertise proved invaluable.  His installers were prompt, courteous, and professional.  His contacts and recommendations for the entire project were beyond helpful.  The process was stress free and fast thanks to Ray and Prattville Carpet.

name: Tracey Cannon
text: Ronnie and David have been fantastic in helping me pick out my floors and shower tile.  I highly recommend Prattville Carpet

name: Chris Jarrett
text: Barry and his team of installers where amazing. From start to finish great job. Barry came to my house after I got off work (well after 6) to show me the samples. Lots of option with zero pressure. They installed quickly and with very little interruption in our lives. On the day of the install I got home from work and thought they hadn't come that's how well they cleaned up. It wasn't even apparent they had been there until I walked in and saw my amazing floors. Zero interest payments for 12 months was a nice bonus.

name: J.K. Jones
text: Prattville Carpet put new tile in our house and did a fantastic job!  From helping us select our tile to the installation,  everyone was great.  They even moved all the furniture!

name: Kelli Hill
text: Prattville Carpet went above and beyond to help me after my house flooded.  New flooring in the living room and bedroom areas and it is gorgeous.  I couldn't be more pleased with the flooring and customer service.

name: Marty Sutley
text: I have had multiple experiences with Prattville Carpet and the Boles family.  They have always been honest and reasonable to deal with.  In an industry such as Floor Covering, it is refreshing to find a business owned and operated by people you can trust to do what they say they will do.  It makes all the difference.

name: Angela Addison
text: Super friendly staff. Prices are reasonable, actually better than competition up the road.

name: Robin Kitchens
text: David was very nice about helping me pick out carpet for my house

name: Gaye Pelkey
text: They put in all new carpet and flooring in rental home..great job and great service..

name: adam pike
text: Quality service, friendly sales staff!

name: Alabama Lucey
text: We have done business here before and once again the employees were OUTSTANDING!  They even took us in the back to show us their kitchen flooring so we could have a better feel for what it would look like   Another place you have got to at least check out if you're in the market for flooring.  But they have other items also like tile for backsplashes.

name: Jordan Smith
text: Blake was amazing! I wasn’t having much luck getting ANY responses (email, phone, etc) from other local flooring stores but Blake kept in touch and worked with us on getting us the BEST price and made the process SO easy!!!!! Will recommend to everyone I know, & be using them for all future needs!

name: Tracy Sedlack
text: Needed a quick install to sell a house. Customer service was outstanding. Jim worked with me and helped find me a great deal on new flooring. Installed two days later and looks great. Can't thank Jim and the installers enough for the great service and help picking a great looking carpet for the whole house.

name: Ashley Carson
text: Most definitely a one stop shop!!! I am so very happy we chose American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to take care of all our needs in building our new home. My husband an I finally built our dream house this year;  we were treated like family from all the staff and installers from start to finish.  We did LVP flooring throughout it is absolutely gorgeous. They helped us pick out the perfect tile and accent pieces for our walk-in shower. The solid wood cabinets were just fantastic they went perfect with the quartzite we chose for the kitchen an master bath, it makes my heart beat fast, it's so beautiful. They have a large selection from all over he world, slabs I have never seen before anywhere.                                        I want to thank everyone there for making our experience a little less painful, anytime you build a house things come up and we were very pleased how they worked with us on our scheduling.  I highly recommend American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to all my family and friends. We are so very happy!!!!

name: Melanie Lobel
text: First visit to American Carpet and had the best experience picking out carpet. Johnny Marino was such a professional and assisted me with making great selections at a terrific price. They were able to meet my installation requirements immediately. The quality and service was so remarkable that I went back 2 days later and purchased gorgeous marble for my fireplace surround. What a pleasure doing business with American Carpet and Flooring. Definitely ask for Johnny. Great guy.

name: Tazman Reid.
text:
The sales lady was fantastic, she pretty much took care of everything over the phone, I went to the store and was out of there in 10 min.
A 10 for Marisa !

name: Gerald Drakeford
text:
Mr. Don Williams always has a warm smile and greeting each time we visit the store. Johnny facilitated our flooring and granite orders and was great to work with as well!

We had hardwood floors as well as granite countertops installed.  Glynn and his crew did a great job on the flooring. They were on time each day and were very attentive to details during the installation.

Likewise, the guys that installed our granite countertops were top shelf as well, detail oriented, and very professional.

Would definitely recommend American Carpets and Flooring!

name: Kishina Brown
text: I was looking for purchasing new flooring for the rest of my house. I walked in with a large piece of carpet in hand to see what would look good with my new carpet. As I entered I was not greeted. I noticed three men in a corner talking and I walked close by and again never greeted. So I will not ever step foot in this store again.

name: James Sessions
text: My wife and I decided to totally remodel our master bathroom which was a big deal for us.  After making visits to several stores and getting conflicting advice on what we could and should not do. We were so confused but knew how we wanted the new bathroom to look.   I suggested that we stop by American Flooring which we decided to be the last stop before leaving Mobile and head to Baldwin County or even Pensacola. American Flooring should have been our first stop.  We met Johnny Marino and shared with him what we wanted to see in our new and updated bathroom project.  He took our the contractor's proposal along with many pictures that my wife had gotten off the internet, how we wanted our new bathroom to look.  He provided us with expert advice.  He took the time to tell us what we needed.  He was more than a salesman... I considered him an expert in flooring.  We are so excited, we cannot wait until the job is completed.

name: Burchfield lc
text: Great service from picking out flooring to the install! Highly recommend! They are a locally owned company with fantastic prices, I will be back next time!

name: Sandra Mikul
text: Beautiful installation! Michael and Cliff were pleasant, efficient and we love the final product.  Glad we decided on new counters! Also, Robert gave us good advice on choosing colors while we were looking at the large inventory.  Thanks

name: Daniel Garrido
text: Amazing store to buy from, great people and service. Definitely recommend!

name: Ashley La Bounty
text: Our experiences has been amazing!!! The quality flooring and staff is amazing. Had the pleasure of working with the owner himself and he make us feel right at home every time.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: I only deliver packages to them but every time I go they always helping someone with a great attitude.

name: Stanley Self
text: Great. Carpet and pad.  Wonderful flooring.   Installers were very friendly and respectful.  Salesman was very friendly and helpful.  Very satisfied.

name: Theresa Seibert
text: American Flooring and Granite has impeccable customer service very knowledgeable on all the products.  I love the fact that they use a 15 year sealer on all the natural stones. They have a large selection to choose from. My counter tops are beautiful!

name: Richard Moore
text:
NEVER AGAIN!
This level of incompetence is unfathomable. My installer calls me up to verify directions, ten minutes later one of the employees calls me to tell me "We can't sell you this flooring" ( That the salesman practically begged us to pay for weeks earlier) Half my house is on my porch and in my yard at this point. They had their third "problem" reported two days earlier but didn't bother to call the people who had bought any of it. The sales man was an absolute joke. I don't know whos brother-in-law he is but that is the ONLY way he could keep his job!
The Installers....were AWESOME! (Sub contracted).
This is only part of the issues I had....all I can say is,
American Flooring will NEVER get another dime from me.

name: Jesse Brewer
text: We did a major  2 1/2 bathroom remodel at our home and American Flooring Cabinets & Granite did a great job! It was a pleasure working with  Jennifer who helped us pick out our porcelain tile and exotic granite.  It did not stop there she took the time to pick out the paint color that would compliment the exotic granite and porcelain tile.  The  selection of porcelain tile and granite options we viewed that day at American Flooring Cabinets & Granite was  top quality.  The workers did a top notch job.  At the completion of the job, Jennifer came out and looked over everything and made sure we were satisfied with everything.  All of our questions were answered.  Our future flooring projects will definitely be handled through American Flooring.

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse! Glad we could serve you!

name: Donna Dicken
text: My husband and I are very please with the whole experience from buying our flooring to the two gentleman who put it in. They did a fantastic job. We LOVE our new floor. We recommend American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite and will use again in the future.

name: Steven Duquette
text: I had a great experience at AFC&G from the minute I walked through the door until the minute the job was completed.  Don and Jennifer were so helpful throughout the entire process and what a selection of materials they have in the storeroom to choose from.  My granite counter tops and custom designed shower turned out like a showroom display.  Many thanks to Roland who did the design and installation.  Every measurement and cut he made was with laser precision.  I highly recommend you visit the showroom to see what they carry and talk with their very knowledgeable sales reps.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Duquette! We loved the finished product and are glad to have you as a loyal customer! If you need anything at all, you know who to call.

name: jay trammell
text: Stay away from this place. Salesman that helped me was great. Owner is crazy to work with I was giving quote and come in to store and he changed it. Very low to do. Obviously does not care about business . This 5k plus Job was going to be a 12k plus job when done so business is not his priority. Other stores did honor their quotes.  Check your options as they lost me and a lot more business because of this guy. Pathetic customer relations .

name: Forest Dixon`
text: American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite is the best place to go if you're interested in perusing some remodeling a home. We just had some new carpet installed in our house and couldn't be more pleased with the outcome! Mr. Don Williams is personable, yet professional. He gave us a fair up-front price as soon as we gave him our measurements. Ms. Jessica also helped us and she was a pleasure to work with as well. Even the installers were professional, quick and did a wonderful job. We are planning on remodeling our bathrooms with new cabinets, granite counter-tops and porcelain tile, so we know exactly where to go for our next project!

resp.text: Thank you, Forest! We appreciate your business!

name: Maggie Ainsworth
text: American Carpet did an AMAZING job on my new vinyl flooring!!! Workers were professional, punctual, and friendly. I would highly recommend them to anyone interested in new floors. Will definitely use them again!!!!

name: Mike Doggett
text: Great Selection!! This store has a TON of products. Jennifer was our salesperson and guided us every step of the way. We looked at engineered wood and solid wood flooring, but ended up getting a beautiful tile that looks exactly like a wood floor. Guests are shocked when they find out it's tile. We also got a backsplash and granite for our bar and it looks amazing. We will be going back when we get ready for cabinets.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking upgrade their home. They had a amazing selection of vinyl plank and vinyl tile that would be perfect for a bigger family on a budget.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike! Great doing business with you!

name: HM M
text: I walked in and was not greeted. I walked up to two people at desks and they didn't seem interested and couldn't seem to help even though I had a tile in my hand. They called another guy. I asked him about finding a similar size to my vintage tile because Lowe's only had 4x4. He said it would have to be measured and hesitated. He said he would see if he could find a tape measure. He came back and measured and said 4.25x4.25 and that was custom. He said I would have to buy a box but wasn't positive he knew how many tiles that was. He did a bunch of stuff on a calculator until he quoted me 100 tiles for $62. I needed 14 so I told him I would check back after searching. He told me he had the same problem when he did his bathroom. He said okay and maybe I would find an open box somewhere. I walked into Home Depot and 4.25x4.25 is a standard size. I bought 14 tiles for $2.46. I'm not sure what to say about that. I will let you come up with your own conclusions.

name: Lynn Sigouin
text:
Thank you once again for another beautiful and professional installation. Our stairs look like the center piece of our new home thanks to our wonderful Irene who gave us great customer service and always followed up with calls, Jonathon and Stephen who installed with perfection for detail and so,so polite and so talented.
And for the kind, sweet voice on the other end greeting me this morning,  Jessica who assisted all my needs.
Great team you have, Don...Jay, I am sorry to have missed you my friend but we couldn't be more pleased .
Blessings to all,
Thank you again,
Ray and Lynn Sigouin (Principe)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lynn!! We are so thankful for your business. Please let us know if you need anything else in the future!

name: Belinda Hall
text: I came to this store for cabinets.  It is going on 2 months. The are not hung. The parts of the cabinets they just ordered without ever coming to my home for any type of measurements are under my carport blocking so I can't park my car. I have called repeatedly,  people have been rude, hung up on, talked down, and still no progress!!

name: Nina Propst
text: We are very satisfied with our new carpet and with the service we received.  We recommend checking them out for all of your flooring and countertops first...it will save you lots of time and stress!  Special thanks to Don Williams.  We will be back.

name: Mendy Nilsson
text: Shannon Williams is fantastic. He listened to my needs and showed me lots of options giving the pros and cons of each type of floor. That allowed me to choose the best floor for my needs and WOW I'm so thrilled with my luxury vinyl plank flooring. So beautiful and so easy to clean it makes cleaning house fun. Thank you Shannon and American!!

name: LeBarbara Stinson
text: I had the opportunity to have my Luxury Vinyl Plank floors installed by Mr. Glenn Smith. He had his team members with him. They were the kindest men. They worked hard and didn't half step on anything! They are funny and welcoming. I would recommend them anytime. I thoroughly enjoyed them. They were professional and operated on total and complete excellence!

resp.text: Thank you, LeBarbara!! We will let Glenn know he did a great job. We appreciate your business!

name: Susan Allen
text:
Very informative, professional, and helpful!

Thanks Don Williams.

name: Lisa McGhee
text: I want to say that I won a contest with American Carpets. My prize was 250$ off any area rug in the show room. I went in yesterday to pick out my rug, and was greeted by the owner Mr. Don.. I never expected to have the experience I had with the owner and or any of the showroom employee's they were all so nice and helpful. The owner was there to help me the whole time and made it very memorable he is a very great guy.. I would never hesitate about sending someone in to get any flooring these people treated me with the up most respect and dignity as if I was a paying customer and I'll never forget that... Thanks again to all the people at American Carpets.. y'all are the best... Thanks again Mr. Don glad to have met you...

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! It was our pleasure!

name: Mr. Curtis
text:
In the past I've remodeled homes for a living, but was never in the position to actually come out of pocket and select carpets, etc.
It turns out making the right choice is lots harder than you think! With the fierce competition now days, it's easy to be told what you want to hear, given prices that you can't judge properly, and ultimately, run around in circles ending with products that are NOT to your satisfaction.
These issues do not arise with American Flooring (the Mobile location is the one I've become acquainted with). The woman who answered my calls, Jessica, was absolutely wonderful to speak with, and the sales person she brought me to the table with, Shane, was both professional, and compassionate.
Suffice it to say I will be returning very soon!

resp.text: Thanks you, Mr. Curtis!! We look forward to hearing from you soon, and in the meantime if you have any questions at all, you know who to call!

name: t h
text: I have recently completed a kitchen renovation and love the outcome. Don helped me select the perfect quartzite countertop for the new island, we purchased luxury vinyl plank for the new floors plus found a beautiful new rug too. Thank you so much for all of your assistance! I am pleased and feel I got a great deal and great service at American Flooring. I would highly recommend them to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you!! We loved the way your kitchen turned out. Looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: candes ritter
text: I’ve had several rooms carpeted and have always received excellent service, prices and installments.  Absolutely...... this is your first stop if you need flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, Candes! We really appreciate your business!

name: Gary Stiegler
text: My wife came in with a sample and the info for the flooring which had been purchased at AC.  Johnny,  the salesman immediately let her know without looking around that they didn't carry the item.  She proceeded to look around the store on her own, no one asking if she needed help, but after 20 minutes, found the exact piece of flooring!  Found Johnny, and he gave her a price of almost $200 for a 12 piece box of vinyl flooring.  Thanks, but NO THANKS American Carpets!

name: Sally Faucheaux
text: Thank you Jennifer ..... She  was my floor and cabinet specialist..... And thank you for all your expertise,   Also want to thank every one else at  American flooring this is not  the. first time that they have done work for me.  I was very pleased in the past,   It has been some years ago I am changing now because I don't want carpet anymore I want to change to ceramic....great job then, and I am sure they will do a awesome job this time as well, after all   I came back for more ;)

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: Jennifer Vaughan is amazing to work with.   She saw my vision and brought it to life.  She also prepared me for the installation experience by explaining it honestly and in depth.   I will never use anyone else in the future except her.   American Flooring needs to hold on to her.

name: Sharon Thompson
text: I am a mortgage lender in the Mobile and Baldwin county areas and have referred more clients than I can count to the Mobile and Gulf Shores locations over the years. Whatever your home needs may be, American Flooring is well rounded with an amazing selection of products, and a wonderful team of sales reps and installers. Be sure you follow them on Facebook, they do lots of giveaways and sales you don't want to miss! If you want to call before you go in and actually schedule ahead, ask for Jessica and she'll make sure someone is there to greet you and meet whatever needs you have!

name: Jessica Bates
text: I'm only giving one star because the material itself was great. The guy that did our template for our countertops measured wrong and only half of my notch was able to be done. The installers flooded my bathroom because the water wasn't off when they took the pipes apart. They knocked several holes in my walls and left without mentioning any of them. After a SIX HOUR install, I still had no water to my sinks and only half of the kitchen done. My stuff wet and laying everywhere and holes in walls in every room they worked in.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the situation. We are reaching out to the installation crew and will make this right for you, whatever it may take. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Update: Thank you for allowing us to fix all of the issues. We appreciate your business!!

name: Leslile Reddick
text: I used American Carpets to install my granite, carpet and laminate flooring in my kitchen.  This was done in August 2013.  My carpet separated between rooms and along the kitchen and living room and nails are sticking up.  My under counter sink is loose.  I have been trying to have this fixed for months now with no resolution at all.  Chris in installation has been out to my house twice to "look" at it with promises of it being fixed.  Nothing has been done.  I feel that the work that was done was unprofessional and cheap.  I spent a lot of money on this and would expect it to last longer than a year and if not, at least for it to be fixed in a timely manner.  I will never refer anybody to American Carpets as my experience has been very dissatisfying.  I have never written a review before, much less a negative one, but I felt I had to because I have been getting the run around for months.

name: Steve Baker
text: Very friendly folks. Not only did I get a great job on my ceramic flooring​, I think that this business has a lot of Christian people and that is why it is doing so good. Chris and his son that laid my flooring did a great job. Shane the salesman also knows his job. A plus to this business.

name: Lacy Hilliard
text: Craig Crawford and his crew did excellent on the installation of vinyl flooring. They were personable, well mannered and addressed my concerns immediately . This is the crew you need for your installation! Showroom time was quick and precise with my needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy! We've let Craig know how great of a job he did. We look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Kem Hall
text: I googled wood floorings and came up with this store. For years I thought they only sold carpet.  I found a vast amount of everything needed for a home; granite, cabinets, wood flooring, tile, rugs, vinyl plank, you name it and its here.  This is a ONE STOP SHOP. Employees are welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable to help with everything. They have good deals too.

name: Kyla Gaston
text: I GOT THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH JENNIFER V. AND JAN R.  - OH MY GOODNESS THEY ARE A TERRIFIC TEAM. I HAD AN ISSUE WITH MY FLOOR WHEN MY HOME WAS BUILT DUE TO THE WRONG DOOR BEING PLACED IN THE HOME, MY WOOD FLOORING HAD TO COME UP DUE TO WATER DAMAGE AND I HAD TO REPLACE IT WITH ANOTHER PRODUCT. JENNIFER AND JAN SAW HOW UPSET I WAS AND WAS ABLE TO MAKE FEEL BETTER AND REASSURED ME THE SECTION OF MY FLOOR WOULD LOOK FABULOUS. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THE TILE AND MOSIAC ACCENT TILE FOR THE FLOOR AREA, IT LOOKS LIKE THE HOME WAS ORGINALLY BUILT THAT WAY. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR JENNIFER AND JAN TWO WONDERFUL LADIES AND THEY ARE GREAT AT THEIR JOBS.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Kyla!!

name: Ethel Moore
text: My husband and I received a warm welcome upon entering the storefront and we were treated wonderfully! I explained to Shannon,  our sales rep,  what I wanted and he took us right to it!  It felt as if we were old friends.  I was never pressured to purchase anything which is a PLUS.  I cannot count the many times that I left a place due to the pressure to buy something that I'm really not looking for.  We also met the 'big man in charge' -as I affectionately refer to him.  You know,  the 'open 8 to 8 so don't be late' gentleman.  Lol.  Very warm and professional.  The carpet they installed looks AMAZING!  It's exactly what I wanted at the price I wanted! I will DEFINITELY recommend American Flooring and Cabinets. Ask for Shannon,  HE IS A GEM!

name: Lynn Zimmerman
text: We had Johnny also five years ago and are sorry we went there. We asked for the best pad that they had and also wanted quality carpet and were told that we had ordered it. Now we have "humps" in our carpet from stretching and we have to replace it soon. They tiled our foyer, hall and kitchen and while we love the tile they are uneven and chipped. Afterwards they fixed some but in order to make it right they would have had to redo most of it.  For $6,000+ we just expected better.  Make sure that you know what you are getting is right and the quality that you expect. We went to the Mobile store to have our work done.

name: AllDone3
text:
Not only did they sell me on buying material from them instead of the competitors in the are, they educated me on WHY was more durable or waterproof than another and explained the difference in the products that I was interested in.

"People buy from people, not companies."

These people took fantastic care of me and my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Aldon! We look forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Katie Azevedo
text: We love our new carpet! The prices were reasonable and everything was done quickly and professionally.

name: Mallory Howard
text: So, my impression was great when I left the store but quickly changed. Salesmen were very helpful. Acted eager to help us get our remodel done. They showed me a countertop that they had in stock. It was ok, but not exactly when I was looking for but they insisted it looked great. I again, said no, I’ll keep looking. Kept looking and found the one, the countertop that would look the best. Left the store with the salesman’s card to call back with measurements. My husband called them 2 hours later to get a quote. Salesman tried selling him the countertop they had in stock but was not what I looking for. My husband told him no, she wants the other. He quoted him a price. Then called back and DOUBLED the the first quote because they’d have to order it. Seems they were eager to help sell what they had in stock, but be darned to sell what they’d have to order. We won’t be making a purchase from this store. Our business will go else where.

name: Scotti Bee
text: Great place. Everyone I worked with was fantastic. Great attitudes, wonderful customer service.

name: Apple Henderson
text: Well..well well, what can I say??  I sought help and met a man named Johnny at American.  We were needing granite and flooring.  He showed us a couple of choices and suggested we go to the warehouse in Loxley to pick granite and took our info and said  let him know what we decide on and we'll get a quote.  Needless to say he lost our info and forgot who we were.  We contacted him and reminded him of the quote.  He was to get with us on several occasions and did not!!  The lady who answered my call was aware of my frustration and got a owner/manager to take my call.  Got another we'll get you the answer and call you spill again.  We are not from here and should have believed reviews...SOOOO grateful to have been referred to HARD ROCK GRANITE....they are professional, personable,  thorough, quick and they treat you like family. If quality everything choose HARD ROCK they will be honest and get you a better deal too!!!!!

resp.text:
April,

I am so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience. We really appreciate your feedback, and hope that in the future you give us the chance to make it right.

name: Logan Crouch
text:
I came in with a friend and Johnny Marino was our salesmen. I have never had a worse experience. He was introduced to us as 'the man who knew it best' and that he had 'been in the business for 43 years'. However, he was not polite, seemed to talk over us as we explained our needs, treated us as if we had no idea what we wanted, and overall was completely unprofessional: not only to us, but for other customers who were in the store. We were shown one product, and after the purchase, were shown a completely different colored product; then were argued to repeatedly that it was the light causing the color difference.

The business had a wide selection of products, and I'm sure with another salesman we would have had a better experience. But this particular transaction just left a bad taste in my mouth.

name: Joshua Carper
text: Dont shop here they are crooks!

name: Victoria Wilson
text: Advertised "Open 8 to 8". Arrived about 5:40 unaware of new store hours. Came to buy flooring for 3 rooms. Salesman took me to the back to look at sheet vinyl rolls and remnants. Told me to browse while he figured out how much I needed from the measurements that I provided. I thought he was taking a little too long. Went to look for him and discovered that everyone had left and locked the doors. That's when I saw a sheet of white paper on the front door with new store hours 8-6. I HAD A PANIC ATTACK! Called my sister. She called Mobile Police Dept. MPD came. A woman in another vehicle then arrived and told him how to get me out. I left a note on the salesman's desk with my name and phone number and what had happened. I picked up my floor plan and measurements and left. NO ONE EVEN CALLED TO APOLOGIZE.

name: Michael A
text: Service was excellent. Shane Gros was very helpful. Definitely the place to shop. Can't go wrong. Thank you Shane for all your help!

name: Todd Burley
text: Visited this place on April 2nd to shop for new carpeting for our new house in Semmes. After we shopped around at several stores we found this place the most useful because of their helpful staff, affordable prices and financing. We ended up buying 1500 sq ft of carpet and had it installed last week, my wife loves the carpet and I love being able to get out of bed barefoot. We are very happy with American Flooring and would recommend them to anyone who needs a good deal on carpet

name: Cyndi Booth
text: I love, love, love my new kitchen granite countertops. They look great with the new cabinets recently installed by American Flooring, Cabinets , and Granite . I had the tile floors installed in a few rooms about 6 months ago. Everything is coming together and looking beautiful! text: When you place an order for 14 boxes for laminate flooring and get 3 boxes you think maybe it was just 1 mistake.  When you also place an order for ceramic tile for the facing of your fireplace at the same time you ordered the laminate flooring and you get 3/4 of it you start to wonder about this store that's been in business for so long. When you place an order for 3 boxes of ceramic tile for the inside of your fireplace at that very same time and you get 1 box because they FORGOT to order 3 and  you have PAID for it ALL!!!!  I am wondering WTH is THEIR problem!!!!  I took back the 1 box of ceramic tile since I didn't like it,  it didn't match, got a refund, pkd up the 3 boxes of flooring and tried to give me the other 2 boxes of ceramic tile I had gotten a refund on?????  Yes, I know had for me to believe too!!  Finally got all of my flooring. Had to reorder more fireplace facing tiles, pd for it, was told it was ordered as I was in the store and would be in that Friday, it came in the next Tuesday!!!! Found out it was NOT ordered until the day AFTER I ordered it!!!!  BTW, I finally went to LOWES, and got the rest of the ceramic tile I needed for the inside of my fireplace that they had IN STOCK!!  All this going on as my contractor was doing what he could with what we had!!!  Needless to say HE was not very happy and will be writing a review also on this store.  I live 18 miles 1 way from this Mobile store.  I made a trip 6 days in a row.  My sales person was Shane Williams.  I would NEVER recommend this store to anyone and will tell everyone I know of my experience.

name: De W.
text:
They promise you ethical treatment, integrity & flawless service. Don't believe it.
Once carpet was selected - salesman assured quality professional installers in a timely manner.
The installer arrived late; talking highly of himself and did not reply or respond when asked questions. Once carpet installed, we inspected job. Carpet had high strips where Sean's were like the carpet was doubled at the seam. I pointed it out to installer (Terry), and he pulled on it saying it won't come loose. I said I wasn't worried about it coming loose but the seam was obviously thick.
He ignored my concern. A week later I called back and spoke to sales person who came our days later to look at it. It took another week to get a call back where salesman asked for a convenient time for installer to come back. I gave him 2-days and timetable around my work schedule. Salesman said he would call installer and get back with me on day & time. I was assured installer would be back to repair on one of the days I provided but he would call back to confirm.
On the day installer was suppose to be here for repair I received a call from installer saying he was calling to set up the appointment. What?! You were were suppose to be here....
I called the store and I got excuses from the lady sales person saying the installer was trying to call me.
Don't bother calling these people..they don't know what they're doing and they are not customer service conscious. I won't be using them again.

name: david loeser
text:
I normally do not do reviews but this place does not practice good business. They are not for the customer but only want to make a sell. My wife had a list of exactly what was needed from the person who was installing the flooring in our house and she showed the list to the people who work there. They showed my wife flooring and she picked the color she likes. Not knowing the type of floor was wrong. Remember these are the “experts”. We unloaded all the floor at the house the next morning the person installing asked why they gave us the wrong stuff. We ended up having to return the floor which we would have purchased the right floor from them but they charged us a 20% restocking fee because they sold us the wrong floor. Knowing what was asked for and needed as my wife showed pictures of the subfloor.

Nonetheless they lost our business and stole 20% because they should have fit that bill due to their lack of of professionalism and customer service.

If you want the cheapest price maybe they are the place to go, who knows. But if you want customer service and want to be sure you are getting the best product for your needs this is definitely not the place to go.

resp.text: Yes they did give us a list of materials they needed. On that list were the items that they needed for a remodel and there was a quantity of flooring that they needed not a specific floor but just a quantity. We asked her what type of floor she was looking for so we helped her get a waterproof floor that she asked for. She had over 100 options to choose, yes we have a great variety at great low prices. Theirs was a 5mm/20mil wear layer at only $1.49 Sf by the way. She even took a sample of the entire piece. When they came to return the floor the installer came with her and he said that he seen the piece when they brought it to their home, he said that he seen the sample  when he was at the store. Why he did not mention he could not install that type of floor in that house we do not know (this was before the purchase was made). We gave her the floor she chose not a wrong one. She also read and signed a receipt that she still has that specifically says **no refunds** that’s why we let people take samples so they make sure they take the correct floor for their home. As many people here know that this is a family and USMC veteran owned and operated store and we treat people with respect. We have extensive knowledge about flooring and helped her get a floor that was waterproof that they did not want to install. We then proceed calling our supplier which does take returns at a 20% cost. Which they claim we stole but we have to give that to our supplier to return the floor just like any other store that charges restocking fees for special orders. We tried to help them and get their money even though we do not take returns and they accepted the 20% from the supplier. We never sold a wrong floor. The customer saw and took a sample and we gave her that exact floor that all the names and numbers match to the sample to the receipt and to all the boxes they took. We never sold a wrong floor. We’re just following store policies that she was well aware of when she signed and payed for her floor.

name: Cindy Vann
text: I will never again buy tile from these people.  The lady that helped us initially was pretty awesome.  She was helpful in helping us pick out our tile for both of our bathrooms that first day.  I called back to place my order & they told me the total that would be charged to my card.  When it cleared it was $65 more & when I called back she said she forgot to charge shipping.  We got a call that part of our order was in so we went to pick it up & that's when they completely dropped the ball.  The cashier lady wanted me to pay for my order again.   She couldn't figure it out because her computer said it was not paid.  Finally got that cleared up but the pick up process was incompetent to say the least.  We ended up going back & they messed up on the tile order on the 3rd pickup - which they said that it was completely not their fault & it was the manufacturers.   It's too expensive to get service like that.  I would never go back & I certainly don't recommend this place.  Anywhere but Robert H Henry Tile!

name: Victoria Mcanally
text: Is this place for real? Where is the 0 star option? I ordered their "Old Chicago Brick" tile option. During the consultation the salesperson (tall thin white woman with mid length brown hair) mentions to us that some of them come broken. On our second conversation after waiting 30 minutes to be acknowledged the sales girl (black woman with short hair) we ask how many are broken in each box? She can't tell us... we decide this is a risk worth taking and order the brick. After installing we have 7 bundles left over. We decide to take them back despite the enormous 25% restocking fee. The sales girl and man who restocked tells us they can't accept the return because the bricks are broken. Are you serious??? We confront the sales girl that we had spoken to before. She admits that she told us some would be broken in every bundle, but has the nerve to tell us we shouldn't have taken them home. After being treated like a criminal, and pitching a fit I was finally able to get my money back (minus the restocking fee of course). I WILL NEVER DEAL WITH THESE SHADY CROOKS AGAIN. I would rather pay 3 times as much then work with them ever again. I HOPE YOU GO OUT OF BUSINESS.

She did a fabulous job that exceeded our expectations.  The installers were professional and on time. Thank you for a wonderful job. We highly recommend Stephanie and her team at Carol’s Carpet.

text: Our carpet is BEAUTIFUL!  Our saleslady, May was outstanding & So  very helpful in picking the right carpet & color.  The workers were also outstanding! They did a fabulous job laying the carpet & putting everything back in place without scratching anything.  Manager, Lisa was so kind to call that evening to see how everything went. So yes, we were extremely pleased.

name: Jeannette Watts
text: Our experience at Carol Carpet was wonderful. My family and I are very please with the out come of our flooring. Kellie Reese was my sale rep and she was so welcoming and helpful. Her crew was thorough and sufficient. I was told it would take 2 to 3 days to complete the job, it took only 1 day. How great was that especially since it was close to the holidays and I needed the floors done before Christmas. Job well done!!. Thanks Kellie.

name: Elizabeth Dean
text: Tony McCarty has been super helpful in several commercial carpeting projects.  He takes care of the job from beginning to end and makes sure we have a great looking project every time.  Our experience with Carol's Carpet has always been great.

name: Brad Fountain
text: We’ve used Carol’s for new countertops and backsplash at our old house and received top dollar when we sold it. We used them again for carpet in our new home. Both times we had courteous and professional sales reps and installers. The end result was great and affordable. We will definitely be continued customers and recommend them to everyone!

text:
Tony McCarty  is very professional and knows what he is doing. I am very pleased with his work ethics and knowledge of his bussiness. He was very respectful, patient and detailed about the wood we choosed. He coordinated very well with my builder in a professional very. One of the best things is he is very honest and helpful. Also  carol carpet has great choices for flooring and great staff to work with. I would highly recommend carol carpet and Tony is great guy to work with.

Khalid

name: Melissa Floyd
text: Have done business with Carol's Carpet for years.  Bought an older home that needed modernizing. Les Chamblee was our salesperson. He helped with granite countertops and tile for the kitchen, hardwood flooring and carpet for bedrooms. Les made the experience very enjoyable and painless. We are more that satisfied with the quality and service that we received. Kudos to Les and the team at Carol's Carpet Montgomery.

text: We had the worst installers. They put big gouges in our floor trim, left nails comming through the tac stripes in every door, and left gaps in the padding. When I asked them to fix it they gave me a hard time saying that is the way it is. I contacted the store and got nothing resolved. Not happy with the service I received.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about the unresolved issue. My manager has contacted you and we look forward resolving the issue.

text: I've dealt with Carol's twice in the last year, and they have been just fantastic to work with -- friendly, informed, helpful, good value.

name: Pat Hayslip
text: Les Chamblee was most helpful & patient with my husband and I while in the store. After we made our choice for our flooring, he was on time for the appointment for measurements. Les was very professional, yet personable while in our home. He called us when the wood & carpet arrived & followed up when the work was completed. The installers were very nice also. Les called after the work was done to see if we were not only satisfied, but to see if he could help us with anything else. We love our wood floor and the tempur-pedic padding recommended by Les. Yes indeed, Carol's carpet, we will call on you again when needed. Les Chamblee is a plus to the business in our book.

text: Reneé is extremely dedicated to helping you make your project a success and will go out of her way, to get you whatever you need, before you need it, and at very reasonable prices! I strongly recommend working with her! And in the unlikely event that she cannot personally procure some random item, she will contact someone within her extensive network of time-proven associates, to put you in touch with a few choices of industry professionals who can get you everything you need! Kudos Reneé, for your help, dedication, and being wonderful to work with!

text:
Shannon Bros is the top pick when needing tile floors installed. They make certain there are no issues when finishing a job. North Alabama, middle southern Tennessee there are no Companies like Shannon Bros who take pride in their work looking and being professional. Be sure and see Mike Shannon also, great personality and takes care of business.
Ed Wood

text: Very experienced small business who do good work. They did a very good job l for a recent business client of mine. Each tile perfect no odd angles or attempts to cover up mistakes.

text: I've worked with Shannon Brothers for many years. They are a long standing, stand up company that installs quality, paver, tile & terrazzo products

name: Carna Triftshauser
text:
Worst Customer Service. I purchased tile on Sept 28th and still don’t have my full order. Last week I emailed 3 times and called. NO RESPONSE. I was told the last box shipped on 10/26 on Nov 2 and that it would be here Nov 3rd. I arrived on Nov 5th to pick it up and was then told it was shipped yesterday and hopefully it might be here on the 6th. Not even an I’m sorry for all the issues. Just tossed the paper back to me through a gate and said oh well.

WILL NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!!

name: Amanda
text: Started off with a great experience at the sales office. While the two employees working the office could not provide a solution to my issue they asked for me to leave my contact information with them, and provided the business card for a coworker that might be able to help. I was told they would have that person give me a call to set up an appointment to have someone come out to my house to see if they can troubleshoot my issue and possibly come up with a solution. After nearly a week there has been no communication from them. Instead, I had to call the person on the business card only to then be told he was not the right person and that he needed to have someone else call me back instead. Still waiting on that call back. My problem is that I bought a set of glass fireplace doors for my fireplace that I should be able to easily install myself, but they do not fit by just a few millimeters in height. I have double checked that I got the correct doors. I know the manufacturer and model number of my fireplace, so I bought the coordinating doors for my fireplace. I am worried that the fireplace and/or tile surround was not done properly and therefore might be the cause of my issue. Please beware this company installs the fireplaces and does the tile/brick work for Lowder New Homes, so if you are a Lowder homeowner you could run into similar issues in the future!!

name: Taylor Chatham
text:
I am giving acme brick 1 star for their pretty displays on kitchen backslashes. Its hard to see the samples the way they are hung. Which isnt a deal breaker but brick color advice from 2 team members was very alarming!

I went with a photo of a fence we will be adding to. I said verbatim to the lady at the front desk & she asked to see the pic and told old tavern in a mere glance. Im an artist and when i saw old tavern I wanted to see someone who knew a thing or two ..... i got the same answer!!!!!!!????!!

I knew immediately I wasn't kookie so I researched it and instantly felt like a side by side would do justice and more than that it did. However,  I may buy from them under my alias but am weary of how much i can trust these people. Research and think ahead before going if u do decide to.

The staff showed us a previously unconsidered option for our new patio, ultra hard and thick porcelain! It's been installed a few years now and we're extremely grateful we didn't go with real or fake stone.
Also, they carry Fire Magic grills, a very high quality American made line of grills.
